description: Flight price comparison MCP server. Search multiple booking sources to find better flight prices.

environmentVariables.name: GEMINI_API_KEY
environmentVariables.description: Google Gemini API key for image extraction (required)

environmentVariables.name: NAVIFARE_API_BASE_URL
environmentVariables.description: Navifare API base URL (optional, defaults to https://api.navifare.com/api/v1/price-discovery/flights)
